text: The women's K-2 500 metres competition at the 2019 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships in Szeged took place at the Olympic Centre of Szeged. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | rowspan=2|Thursday 22 August 2019 || 12:43 || Heats |- | 15:42 || Semifinals |- | rowspan=2|Saturday 24 August 2019 || 09:43 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 12:56
